column5: This programme is designed for those in their early career who have an undergraduate degree in business or a related discipline. We focus on developing young managers who want to pursue international careers. The international cohort of classmates focus on learning cutting-edge global business skills and international management theory. Students will spend a week in Asia undertaking a residency programme in Global Business Strategy.Ranked 3rd Best Masters in Western Europe for International Management - Eduniversal, 2018Ranked 1st in Ireland and 23rd in the World - QS Masters in Management Rankings, 201992% rate of employment post-graduation.*
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
